title: Mixed cations tin-germanium perovskite: A promising approach for enhanced solar cell applications
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Mohd Saiful Adli Azizman, Ayu Wazira Azhari, Naimah Ibrahim, Dewi Suriyani Che Halin, Suhaila Sepeai, Norasikin Ahmad Ludin, Mohammad Nuzaihan Md Nor, Li Ngee Ho
